tool_description: Divide the images into fragments with equal dimensions, in this you can split and images in n x n parts, the api have 2 endpoints, the first use image previously load in the server, the second use a method post for receive the url of the image and the number of rows and columns that you need divide the image
name: Split Image
title: Split Image

api_list.name: split images examples
api_list.description: In the url,  replace row and col for the number that you need

api_list.name: main endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://split-image1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "split-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://split-image1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "split-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
